TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowViewElement extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl implements class System.Activities.Presentation.ICompositeViewEvents
Public Class WorkflowViewElement Inherits ContentControl Implements ICompositeViewEvents
type WorkflowViewElement = class inherit ContentControl interface ICompositeViewEvents

summary.span: 指定任意 UI 元素的基类，该元素显示在 Windows Workflow Foundation 设计器画布上，并以可视方式表示可编辑的原子项的实例。

span.span: Specifies the base class for any UI element that appears on the Windows Workflow Foundation designer canvas and that visually represents an instance of an atomic item that can be edited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 表示的项的示例包括 和 。Examples of items represented by a include and . `WorkflowViewElement` 提供一个公共协定，设计器使用该协定将视觉元素呈现到设计器图面上，并通过各种编辑操作与之进行交互。`WorkflowViewElement` provides a common contract that the designer uses to render the visual element onto the designer surface and to interact with it through the various editing actions. 如果要为 生成设计器，您应使用 基类型。If you are building a designer for an , you should use the base type. 如果在设计器画布上需要将非活动元素视为第一类项，例如需要在画布中拖动的工具箱项，或者对于剪切和粘贴方案，请使用 `WorkflowViewElement` 作为基类。If there are non-activity elements that need to be treated as first class items on the designer canvas, such as a toolbox item that needs to be draggable throughout the canvas, or for cut-and-paste scenarios, use `WorkflowViewElement` as the base class. 如果您不希望使用活动设计器的标准活动 chrome，则 `WorkflowViewElement` 应将其用作基类型，以提供最大的灵活性。If you do not want to use the standard activity chrome for an activity designer, `WorkflowViewElement` should be used as the base type to provide the most flexibility. 表示 UI 中的 ，并使代码能够访问模型项和允许进行更改的 。A represents a in the UI and provides code access to the model item and an that allows changes to be made. ## Examples 有关演示如何创建新的 和 以及随后如何关联它们的示例，请参见 文档中的示例。For a code sample showing how to create a new and an , and then how to associate them, see the sample in the documentation.
